committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to require the Architect of the Capitol to design and have constructed bike paths on the Capitol Grounds and convert the parking lot on the east side of the Capitol Building to grass and gardens.

summary.text: Requires the Architect of the Capitol: (1) to design and construct bike paths on the Capitol grounds; and (2) to convert the parking lot on the east side of the Capitol Building to grass and gardens.

titles.title: A bill to require the Architect of the Capitol to design and have constructed bike paths on the Capitol Grounds and convert the parking lot on the east side of the Capitol Building to grass and gardens.
